settings.title: CouchPotato settings
settings.subtitle: Please make sure to fill in the api settings before trying anything, there is no error checking yet
settings.webhook_subtitle: This lets CouchPotato send snatched and download updates to your Homey. Create a new one at webhooks.athom.com
settings.use_default_subtitle: Listen to 'Add the movie Moviename' or 'Add new movie to CouchPotato'. Otherwise use your own flow to trigger CouchPotato.
settings.skip_confirm_subtitle: For when you're feeling lucky. Not recommended though.

messages.what_movie?: What movie do you want me to add?
messages.sorry_couldnt_add: I'm sorry, Dave. I'm afraid I can't do that.
messages.not_adding: I'm sorry, Dave. I won't add it.
messages.confirm: Do you want me to add __title__ to CouchPotato?
